related.meaning: baru-baru ini, beberapa hari yang lalu

lessons.japanese: セールスマンは大抵口達者だ。
存外、口は達者なようね。
lessons.indonesian: It seems like you're unexpectedly eloquent.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はフランス語が達者だ。
lessons.indonesian: She has a good command of French.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の父は若い頃泳ぎが達者だった。
lessons.indonesian: Her father could swim well when he was young.

lessons.japanese: 彼は水泳が達者でテニスもうまい。
lessons.indonesian: He is a good swimmer and also plays tennis well.

lessons.japanese: 祖父は８０を越えていますが、足はいたって達者です。
lessons.indonesian: My grandfather is over eighty years old, but he is a good walker.

lessons.japanese: セールスマンは大抵口達者だ。
祖父は８０を越えていますが、足はいたって達者です。
lessons.indonesian: My grandfather is over eighty years old, but he is a good walker.

lessons.japanese: 彼は水泳が達者でテニスもうまい。
lessons.indonesian: He is a good swimmer and also plays tennis well.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の父は若い頃泳ぎが達者だった。
lessons.indonesian: Her father could swim well when he was young.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はフランス語が達者だ。
lessons.indonesian: She has a good command of French.

lessons.japanese: 存外、口は達者なようね。
lessons.indonesian: It seems like you're unexpectedly eloquent.

lessons.japanese: 友だちとメールをしていて、文章が達者だと褒められた。
lessons.indonesian: I wrote an email to my friend and he praised me for my writing skills.
